ChildCareTech.controller

Interface TableWindowControllerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeInputWindowController, EventReportController, FoodsListController, KitchenController, NewAdultAnagraphicsController, NewBusController, NewCanteenesListController, NewCanteenManagerController, NewKidAnagraphicsController, NewTripListController, NewWorkDayController, TripPresenceRegistrationController, TripRoutesController

    public interface TableWindowControllerInterface
    This interface should be implemented by those controllers that contain a refreshable node such as tableViews, listViews etc and need to have accessors windows. Provides refresh and update notification requests to accessors window controllers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyUpdate()
      This mehod should manage the actions to take in case of an update notification.
      void refreshTable()
      This method should manage to refresh the controller's refreshable nodes.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshTable

        void refreshTable()
        This method should manage to refresh the controller's refreshable nodes. Should be called also by outside the controller (for example by accessor windows' controllers).

      • notifyUpdate

        void notifyUpdate()
        This mehod should manage the actions to take in case of an update notification. Should be called also by outside the controller (for example by accessor windows' controllers).
